name: OpenAI Codex
key_features: Generates and edits code from conversational prompts inside ChatGPT
Executes snippets in a sandbox to validate output
Supports multiple programming languages and frameworks
Provides conversational explanations, refactoring suggestions, and debugging assistance
supported_models: Integrated into ChatGPT; specific model names are not exposed
pricing_model: Available to ChatGPT Plus and enterprise subscribers
